snippet: A lengthy inquiry into a Nov. 10 explosion that devastated an Indianapolis subdivision, killing two people and injuring 12, revealed a likely scheme to collect insurance money.
abstract: Lengthy inquiry into a Nov 2012 explosion that devastated Indianapolis subdivision of Richmond Hill, killing two people and injuring 12, reveals likely insurance scheme that went wrong; murder and arson charges have been brought against home's owner Monserrate Shirley and two others.
lead_paragraph: A lengthy inquiry into a Nov. 10 explosion that devastated an Indianapolis subdivision, killing two people and injuring 12, revealed a likely scheme to collect insurance money.

headline.seo: Inquiry Into Indianapolis Blast Suggests Scheme Gone Wrong
headline.main: Shattered Subdivision Offers a Trail of Clues
headline.print_headline: Shattered Subdivision Offers a Trail of Clues
